Kiefer's big break came when he landed the role of a lifetime as "Raven Blackwood" in the critically acclaimed film "Moonlight Serenade" (1998). The performance earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor, catapulting him to stardom.

Throughout his career, Kiefer has continued to explore various creative outlets, from acting in blockbuster films like "The Patriot" and "Phone Booth", to producing and hosting several documentary series on environmental conservation.

When he's not working, Kiefer can be found hiking the Appalachian Trail, playing lead guitar for his blues-rock band, "Whiskey Wanderers", or experimenting with vegan cooking in his kitchen.

And, of course, he's still not Jack Bauer from "24".

Kiefer Sutherland was born on December 21, 1958, in London, England, to actor Donald Sutherland and his first wife, Shirley Douglas. Growing up, Kiefer spent his childhood moving between England, Canada, and the United States, which undoubtedly influenced his distinctive accent and worldly outlook.

Kiefer's early interest in acting led him to make his screen debut in 1983, playing the role of a young soldier in the film "Max Dugan Returns". Throughout the 1980s and 1990s, he appeared in a range of films, including "Stand by Me", "Young Guns", and "A Time to Kill".

However, it was his starring role as Jack Bauer in the critically acclaimed television series "24" (2001-2010, 2014) that catapulted Kiefer to international fame. His intense performance earned him multiple awards and nominations, including an Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series.

In addition to his acting career, Kiefer is also a musician. He has released two blues-rock albums, "Down in a Hole" (2016) and "Reckless & Me" (2019), showcasing his soulful vocals and skill on the guitar.

Throughout his career, Kiefer has demonstrated his versatility as a performer, effortlessly transitioning between dramatic roles, comedic performances, and even music. With his unique blend of talent, charisma, and authenticity, Kiefer Sutherland has become a beloved figure in the entertainment industry.
